original_text: They covered the face of the whole land, so that the land was darkened, and they ate all the plants in the land and all the fruit of the trees that the hail had left. Not a green thing remained, neither tree nor plant of the field, through all the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 메뚜기가 온 땅을 덮어 땅이 어둡게 되었으며 메뚜기가 우박에 상하지 아니한 밭의 채소와 나무 열매를 다 먹었으므로 애굽 온 땅에서 나무나 밭의 채소나 푸른 것은 남지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: They covered the face of the whole land
so that the land was darkened
and they ate all the plants in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 땅에 있는 모든 식물을 먹었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and all the fruit of the trees that the hail had left
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우박이 남겨둔 나무의 모든 열매를 먹었습니다.

sentences.original_text: neither tree nor plant of the field
through all the land of Egypt
